extendedInfo.description: The most intuitive, useful and simple to use weight loss app for your smartphone. Weight Meter is a great app for you to support your diet efforts and simply keep track of your weight on a regular basis on your Android device.Track your weight, BMI (Body Mass Index), body fat percentage and even your own user-defined tracking items. Create profiles for yourself and your family. Various charts, statistics, trends and much more will help you monitor your progress and boost your motivation to reach your ideal weight.Start today, you're worth it!â Feel free to contact us for any questions, feature requests, ideas for improvement or bugs! Just use the email provided by the google play store, the in-app contact feature or follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/cryofyAwards:â Featured app on 'The Fresh Living Project' @ http://www.freshlivingproject.comKey features:â¢ Simple, fun and intuitive to use weight journal.â¢ Innovative and clear user interface: almost no typing required, easy to use slide controls.â¢ Widget for your home screen.â¢ Multi-user support: create profiles for yourself, your partner, your kids.â¢ User-defined tracking items: create and track your own items, fully integrated in the app.â¢ Available languages: English, Deutsch, æ¥æ¬èª, íêµ­ì´, EspaÃ±ol, PortuguÃªs, Italiano, FranÃ§ais, ä¸­æ, Ð ÑÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹, à¤¹à¤¿à¤à¤¦à¥, Svenska, Nederlands, Polskiâ¢ Support of metric and imperial units: Pound, Kilogram, Foot, Centimeter and many more.â¢ Measure and estimate your body fat percentage: Weight Meter determines your body fat in quick and easy fashion. â¢ Built-in BMI calculator: Your Body Mass Index is calculated automatically.â¢ Built-in ideal weight calculator: Set your ideal weight as your weight goal and monitor your progress.â¢ Powerful analysis and reporting function via charts and spreadsheets: Don't lose track of your weight, BMI and body fat percentage and easily keep an eye on your weight loss or weight gain.â¢ 'Remind me' functionality: Never forget to take your weight again!â¢ Monitor and support your progress with photos and notes.â¢ Backup and restore your data.â¢ Export and import csv files: Monitor your weight, BMI and body fat percentage with Excel, Numbers or Google Docs on your laptop or desktop computer.â¢ Export charts of your weight, BMI and body fat percentage and share them directly with friends via email, on Picasa, facebook and many more.â¢ Integrated guide to measure your body fat percentage.â¢ An extended help lets you discover the various functions of this app.

reviews.title: Buggy. Unclear interface.
reviews.comment: One day added weight ok. Next day could not. Done button edits prev record.
reviews.author: Valery Starovoitov

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: Easy to use, very useful in tracking weight loss.
reviews.author: Colleen Reilly

reviews.title: Confusing and un-intuitive
reviews.comment: Got frustrated after 10 mins and deleted it
reviews.author: Andrew Locke

reviews.title: Does not work with imperial measurements
reviews.comment: After reducing my weight below 13 to 12.13 do I discover that this app divides stone into 10 pounds not 14.  The new update promises to fix this. I update and all my old values are converted into pounds. 13.4 becomes 13.56 etc, effectively wiping all my pass record.  I can\'t even start over and enter todays weight as the output may be divided into 14 now but the input is still divived into 10!
reviews.author: Julian Kigwana

reviews.title: Doesn\'t store weight
reviews.comment: Looks nice, profiles feature is also cool idea. But it doesn\'t perform its main goal - it doesn\'t store weight data, always showing 0 (fat percentage is stored without any error).
reviews.author: Ekaterina Kravtcova

reviews.title: Looks good, units setting not obvious
Love it
reviews.comment: Was looking for something easy to use without all the other crap that\'s in alot of weight loss apps... This is it... So easy, quick to load my weight and great graphics... THANKS HEAPS...  :-D
reviews.author: Jo Gee

reviews.title: Bf data not saving
reviews.comment: Disappointing as it looks like a promising app ... doesnt remember details between weigh ins ... keeps asking me to reenter the same details each time .. body fat did not save
reviews.author: Sean Fishlock

reviews.title: I will also state that your stone measurement is wrong
reviews.comment: From what I can tell, a good little app but I can\'t use it as the stone measurement has 10 notches in it as the other reviewer says. A stone has 14lbs in it, so when entering my weight my BMI is coming up lower than it should. Maybe it was programmed at 14lbs per stone but the option when you\'re entering weight only gives 10 notches, so 10st 7 is 10.5 and 10.05 is.... Too much effort! Easier to download another app which has it right straight away, sorry!
reviews.author: Laura Simpson

reviews.title: Good but a small problem
reviews.comment: This is a good weight tracker as long as you don\'t weigh over 9 pounds in a stone! As a stone has 14 pounds.
reviews.author: Daniel Jackson

reviews.title: Let down
reviews.comment: Please update so that it recognize that there are 14 pounds in a stone and not 10. I will then rate as 5 star
reviews.author: Shannon Dunn

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: There isn\'t anything else I could want in this app.
reviews.author: Michael Scott

reviews.title: Functional and well designed
reviews.comment: Data access password or any other lock would be great.
reviews.author: Mike Tim

reviews.title: \"Partner offers?\"
reviews.comment: Just what I need; more people trying to sell me something. Update: Now I can\'t set weight without flipping the bar *a long time*. Uninstallingm
reviews.author: Michael Monroe O\'Gollaher

reviews.title: Nice and useful
reviews.comment: I really like this app. It does what it says and is easy to use.
reviews.author: Aleksandar Kolev

reviews.title: Can\'t record weight
reviews.comment: The tool does not work for me, my weight shows as 0.
reviews.author: Stephanie Botting

reviews.title: Xperia miro
reviews.comment: Excellent I can control my weight all day and get goals
reviews.author: Andres Francisco Espa\303\261a Gomez

reviews.title: Looks a good app, 14lbs in a stone though
reviews.comment: Looks a good app, 14lbs in a stone though, not 10
reviews.author: Vaughn T
